title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: You might feel as if youre operating in an alternative universe where you find it difficult to focus and prioritize your work tasks. This uncharacteristic lack of clarity stresses you out, perhaps even inducing a temporary mental paralysis. However, dont rush to fix yourself today, because youre not necessarily broken. Travel down the rabbit hole for the sake of your curiosity. Fortunately, a powerful cosmic cleansing energy brings a more potent ability to concentrate to the surface. Honor the necessities and desires that rest deeper in your heart. President Abraham Lincoln said, Discipline is choosing between what you want now and what you want most. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
